website_summaries.verdict: A smaller case with glass doors to protect books and curios from dust and light.
pros: Like an antique barrister's bookcase, it boasts protective doors made from tempered glass for safety
A sturdy construction, despite its MDF components
cons: The three shelves are 11-inches deep and may not hold larger items
Some owners report struggling with the assembly process

website_summaries.verdict: A good vintage look for more traditional display case setup. Should be considered to be more of a permanent investment.
pros: Tempered glass is exceptionally strong and resistant to abuse
Adjustable internal shelves can accommodate objects of different heights
cons: Cabinet is heavy due to the MDF shelf construction

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cabinet for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Love this little cabinet. Perfect for what I use it for. I display my metal earth models that I build. This is my second purchase and although it is a bit cheaply built in the back in looks good from the front. I added some led strip lights plugged into a timer to regulate lighting times for about 22 bucks and mirror stick on squares inside to give it a reflective ability which makes it look deeper and helps with the visual display of my models. Overall I am very happy with it. Pictures are of both of my cabinets. Took my wife and myself about two hours total to do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Wolz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to perk up my dining area, and to store all my candles. I chose this and it is perfect. Well-made and the color is close to the picture. I put it together myself fairly easily but I don't like those cam-lock things. I was nervous about the glass doors but it was packed securely and everything was fine. And it's sturdy enough to put my seasonal decor on top too. (There is a pic of it in the image section)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cabinet to use as a mini china cabinet. I did change out the handles, as you can see, with some modern looking ones and it updated the cabinet very nicely! For the price, you just can't beat it. I would HIGHLY recommend this cute little cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: WeekendWarrior2017

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I put this together and found the construction was terrible and it is not very sturdy. Of course the packaging was destroyed by the time I had all the pieces out so no returning the item. the glass in the doors is very loose and the corners of the doors do not hold together. I had to use picture hangers crosswise on the door corners just to hold them together. Also, there is no magnet on the doors to hold them closed, but the lid of the cabinet has a magnet, so it appear someone forgot to put the door magnets in the package. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Horse handler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bookcase for the price. The shelves are deep. You can fit smaller pocket-size books two deep if you want. There's plenty of space between the shelves for slightly taller books as well. And the backing assembly is pre-drilled with holes for the screws! No nailing flimsy backing into this one. The doors line up almost perfectly - the leveling difference is not noticeable unless you're looking for it. I cut a small hole in the backing to feed power for LED lighting strips and the inside looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bath
customer_reviews.text: Needed additional storage space in the master bath. Combined the floor with the matching wall cabinet and the set works beautifully. I am impressed with the quality of the product. Great value. The dimensions of the floor cabinet are 26" Wide x 35" Tall x 12" Deep. The dimensions of the wall cabinet are 21" Wide x 24" Tall x 8" Deep.
customer_reviews.author: daugylink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small bookcase - 5 Stars and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this bookcase. I needed a small storage place for frequently accessed items. We live in a rural area with lots of dust, so I wanted glass door fronts. I was nervous because this was so inexpensive. It was well packaged, nothing was broken, all the predrilled holes were perfectly aligned. It was easy to assemble and I was able to put most of it together with only a little help attaching the door fronts. The back screws on instead of nailing and I think it will hold up beautifully. I purchase a lot on Amazon but do not write many reviews. This deserved a 5 star review!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W.

customer_reviews.title: quality control could be better
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet came in a damaged package but packing foam protected unit/a plus. One cam would not tighten completely, the glass for one door was cut oo short for pins to hold on one corner and the cast handles were two different sizes so we need to buy handles. One handle was 3 3/4 inches center to center hole and one was 3 1/2 inches center to center hole. Looks nice and it replaces a sauder cd cabinet and wood looks better but top is a different shade of oak then sides or front but still matches other furniture in dining room and all of our woodwork so I really am not too upset.
customer_reviews.author: zeke

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works great for keeping my kids electrics hostage
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Looks nice. Was easy to assemble if you arent a total idiot and works for what I needed it for...locking up my kids electrics when they show their ass and get grounded....they can look but cant touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kasi Spires

customer_reviews.title: good looks, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Not hard for one person to assemble, although they recommend two. I appreciate that the back is not cardboard, tho what you get is only slightly more substantial. But otherwise a very sturdy attractive piece that is small enough to fit nearly anywhere but large enough to afford ample storage/display. The only tool the instructions call for you to provide is a phillips-head screwdriver. Get two or three of different sizes for the different-sized screws. Also get a pair of scissors to cut open the blister pack in which the fasteners are contained.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Impressive item to fit the need for a curio case
customer_reviews.text: The "fit and finish" of this item is very good: the veneer is attractive and realistic. Very impressive that the glass panels can be shipped this way. The only negative was that the cabinet doors were only glued at the corners, so one had come loose (in shipment?). The easy fix was to re-glue using a good panel adhesive, then clamp for an hour--good as new. finally, 'was impressed that the back panel pieces were also faced with the veneer, rather than simple particle board (or worse). All in all, the finished product is hard to tell from an item costing 2-3 times more.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy, Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We looked at many cabinets in local furniture stores, trying to meet size and quality requirements. Finally found and ordered this cabinet. Wasn't sure I would be happy with the quality, but found It is very nice, solid wood and better built than most of the cabinets we had seen. The price is at the low end of all we looked at, some costing in the $400.00 range. It took about 45 minutes to assemble but it was not hard and everything fit well. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: It’s cheap keep your expections low
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and with hesitation I ordered and crossed my fingers. It’s a cheap piece so i never expected restoration hardware quality nor should you. it was pretty easy to assemble with the exception of one corner where the top connects to the side. The hole was to big and the screw wouldn’t hold. For the most part it looks acceptable. There are some scratches here and there. The doors don’t really line up. I’ll be surprised if the doors hold at all given the tiny screws holding it. It will serve the purpose for what i needed it for. Keep your expectations low and you’ll like it.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy wilmore

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price, but a bit unstable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 2 years ago and so far it has been great! It was easy to assemble, it's wonderful for keeping my books and knickknacks in an aesthetic spot without having to dust around them every week, and it adds some character to my room. The only issue is that when I needed to move it from one room to another, one of the cam bolts on the bottom fell out and the entire shelf is a bit wobbly as a result. I've put it back in multiple times, but it keeps falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Frost

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: My review agrees with another I read, in that the cam locks did not align properly with the screws, making it nearly impossible to tighten them. Unit kept falling apart while I was trying to tighten it. Cam locks in other RTA furniture I've assembled worked smoothly; these were loose in the holes...very frustrating. Seems I will end up using globs of Gorilla Glue to hold this cabinet together. Yes, $100 is way too much for this, at least for me. Should have checked furniture consignment stores first.
customer_reviews.author: V. McMurray

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty piece if it stayed together. Literally fell apart while assembling. Dowel holes too big, cam bolts do not hold it together. Really is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: kathy goss

customer_reviews.title: The cabinet itself is nice. However assembly was a joke
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet itself is nice. However assembly was a joke.. holes do not line up when screwing, doors have gap at top and plastic piece on back is not even the same length as cabinet. I would recommend spending money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller cabinet to go in my living room for video game console, dvds and etc. I chose this one due to dimensions and reviews. When it arrived I had some anxiety about putting it together. But this product had such great instructions and I put it together by myself in very little time. It had a package that held all the screws and bolts and precisely labeled. It was so great and looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice !
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is Perfect. Very solid and just what I needed as a small bookcase. Fast shipping, packaged extremely well. Arrived in perfect condition. Instructions easy to follow, you will not have a problem with assembly if you follow the instructions. I assembled alone, would have been faster to have some extra hands to help. I am very happy with this purchase. Great little cabinet with so many options for use.
customer_reviews.author: Carole B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution as a Library Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We have some books over 100 yrs old & wanted a nice way to store them. Our son brought this cabinet to my attention & thought it would be a perfect solution. Then, because of some reviews, I tried to cancel, but was unable, happily. Our son put it all together for us. The books are very heavy but this little library unit holds them. Is some kind of wood & wood composite. Coordinates well with various shades in our oak floors. Hope photos help others. Photo of back of unit included.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I really like this small cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this small cabinet. I needed it to handle a little overflow of boxed goods in my kitchen. It went together pretty easily, and didn't have any damage. It's not the highest quality of furniture, but it's not cheap looking or flimsy, either. I think the description said it was an oak finish, but I do not see any oak grain on it at all. It's a medium brown, with a slight reddish tone. It works fine for me, even though it wasn't exactly the color I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Auntkay53

customer_reviews.title: Solid cabinets that are easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how anyone can have a hard time putting this cabinet together- It's super easy and intuitive. If you put it together properly, it shouldn't be wobbly at all- it's wood and the cams hold it tight. I'm only giving this cabinet 4 stars because I ordered 2 and both of mine arrived with wear spots on the front of one of the doors- it's a packaging problem. I'm not going to return them though- they are in a room full of antiques, holding fossils. They fit right in.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: The color and design are great for an inexpensive little cabinet. We use it for coffee station in den. The color goes with any decor really. The doors were a tad pain to put on but I was doing it alone. The rest was super easy and it was light enough for me to carry alone.
customer_reviews.author: Spea

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet is not wobbly at all. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cabinet. Perfect size and width for our kitchen. Was put together by my son and hubby so I was surprised when I got home. They said it wasn’t bad to assemble. I have my candles, some trinkets and health food items in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: There were no problems with assembly and this cabinet has a beautiful finish. The tempered glass makes it safe. The packaging was successful at protecting it as the exterior of the box looked like it had taken a blow of some power. I did not need all the fasteners that it shipped with but the extras were an example of the manufacturer's attention to customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Accent for Home
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture is just gorgeous, the picture doesn't do it justice. I got it because I am sick to death of dusting my movies...lol. Well, I got more than that, I got function and beauty. Great buy and I would recommend it if you are debating it - go for it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture piece despite mixed reviews!
customer_reviews.text: No problems with missing parts or the assembly process of this product. Instructions were easy to follow and it didn't take long at all to put together. I hesitated to buy this due to the mixed reviews (some reviewers noting the product was not sturdy or that it was falling apart) but I had no issues at all. Item looks great, exceeded my expectations, and I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: So classy!
customer_reviews.text: Rather difficult to assemble. I had to retool some of of the holes and change the hardware. Once I corrected the failed parts, the item went together very well. It is lovely and has a rather classic look. Please be aware that you will have to replace parts to make this work.
customer_reviews.author: lildaleksec

customer_reviews.title: Needlessly difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: The cam locks and dowels used to assemble the cabinet did not have the proper fit & tension making assembly far more difficult than necessary. Even adding glue did not result in the cabinet being as sturdy as I would have expected. I considered returning it for a replacement but feared I would have the same issues with the next unit. It is a beautiful piece of furniture, and the wood and finish were of better quality than expected. I now just have to hope that it does not wobble or fall apart once it starts getting used.
customer_reviews.author: VA Marie

customer_reviews.title: No wonder it's only $99
customer_reviews.text: Quite a disappointment. Usually when you assemble bookshelves and such the hardware such as the wooden dowel's, shelf pins and bolt are sized to fit the frame. They were all extremely loose and are very very hard to get the cam bolt's to fit into the excessively loose cam lock.
customer_reviews.author: tammy bucklew

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This book case if flimsy.. The doors do not stay closed.. I had to use a black bag tie to keep them shut. I am not impressed with the quality of this piece. It is not by any means sturdy. I don't understand these glowing reviews of this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Package was beat up
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised that the unit wasn't more damaged when it arrived. The box that the cabinet was in was far too large, and looked like someone had dropped it multiple times and then kicked it across the pavement. The box had been "repaired" many times with tape so I guess an attempt was made. The cabinet itself had a lot of dings, scratches and one edge of the top enamel was chipped very badly (you can see the layers of particle board). The glass was okay though. Decided to keep because it would be too much hassle to try to return.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice little cabinet! Good quality wood except for the back, which I expected. My daughter and I put it together. Easy to assemble and the pre-drilled holes lined up perfectly. I’m using it to store home office items where I’m working at my dining room table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to assemble as promised
customer_reviews.text: However, it is a nice little cabinet. I use it to keep all of my dog's food, snacks, toys and monthly meds in. Keeps everything out of the way and contained. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This piece is exactly as expected. I keep books, photo albums, and folded blankets in it, in the living room. It has a low profile, but keeps my things handy and looking neat.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this as a liquor cabinet and it works out great. It is well made and easy to assemble. I had to drill new holes to reposition the shelves, but that was to accommodate bottles. I would like it about 8 inches taller, but overall it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: CT HOGman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this cabinet to store liquor in it. Was easy to put the together but discovered that the magnet that holds to doors together was put in too far from the front causing the doors to not close properly. If you buy, prepare to undo the magnet and move it up toward the front so the magnet will catch.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Bookshelf is sturdy . . . now
customer_reviews.text: This bookshelf was very, very wobbly. I bought it based on how sturdy all of those reviews said it was. They are not true. However, after I glued the backboard fast to the frame and glued the seam up the back, it became sturdy and now I am happy with it. My daughter got 3 splinters putting it together for me and I didn't think that was very good, but I did not expect super high quality for the price. All considered, I am glad I got it. It is very nice looking and will hold my books. I love the glass doors.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Very Economical
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 of these and probably will buy another in the future. They look fantastic and hold books very well. They are very sturdy and we have them by our bed as side tables as well as book cabinets. Our bed is very high so regular bedside tables would not work. These are the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: goodwordtoday

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet and it holds all the knick knacks safely. Very sturdy and very beautiful. It takes a little time to put together and I am a female who did it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dbtx

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Charming
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was relatively easy; glass was already attached to the door. I think the magnet that keeps doors closed should be a little stronger. It looks really nice and is just a tad lower than kitchen counter height so it looks good next to counter to display my special china.
customer_reviews.author: KathleenR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my dining room
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful small cabinet to display my glasses. The instructions are very clear and easy to follow. The only addition would be to identify the front vs the back on the side pieces.
customer_reviews.author: mjp28

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easily in under an hour, even with one screw-up - my fault. I'd give it a "5" except one of the provided screws was bent & useless and there was minor marring on one of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Lipman

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy but it works for my dead things lol. The screws on the bottom come out every time you move it and it’s still a little wobbly but I don’t mind—was cheap and decently easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good size book case/cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together.The instructions suggest it's a 2-person job to assemble. I did it on my own, but could have used another pair of hands when attaching the glass 'doors.' The doors need to be lifted just a little in order to line up with the hinge/screws/holes. My workaround was to place a slim book under the bottom of each door. Looks great and holds a lot of books.
customer_reviews.author: C Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of hours to casually put it together. It's reasonably sturdy and looks a wee bit better than I'd anticipated, given the price. Not a bad little cabinet at all.
customer_reviews.author: Widowedwalker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra storage in our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for additional storage in our master bathroom and it's been a life saver. The drawers in our vanities are too small so we put this cabinet on the counter between our two sinks and we use it for all of our daily-use items, extra towels, etc. Problem solved. And it looks good too. Added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: TLWebster

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt look cheap- looks really nice although some pieces are cheaper than expected. The back piece is very flimsy thin, and in 2 sections. All in all when its up it looks great though!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Product is a joke!
customer_reviews.text: Product was a joke to put together, will not stay together, wood is broken, glass keeps falling out, & doors do not close properly or stay closed!
customer_reviews.author: Humble & Kind

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, for sure. It was far sturdier than expected and SUPER easy to assemble (I put it together in like 10 minutes with my 4 year old). The wood is a really pretty warm color. I really like it. I added fabric to the back for some color inside before I put on the back panel and it was seamless. I'd say it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: NBQ

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cabinet but it has a large scratch on the top they tried to cover up. They should of put another top in the box instead of trying to cover it up.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with quality
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking for a glass door cabinet for some time and was a bit skeptical of this one considering the price. However, I was very impressed with the quality of the cabinet and its packing. This is a solid cabinet, not flimsy MDF construction. It does go together with hardware like that found on IKEA and other modular furniture. However, with the addition of wood glue on the pegs connecting the top/bottom to the sides, mine is stable and solid. Great color, wood grain, etc. I would definitely purchase this cabinet again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Better by glue or extra screws to keep this from falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The holes for the hardware were too large for actual assembly. I actually had to drive other holes and screw the cabinet together because it fell apart using the existing hardware with the cabinet. It is a beautiful cabinet when assembled, but I did not want to spend extra time and extra parts to keep it from falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a broken ClosetMaid cupboard. I wanted something better quality this time that looked better and could withstand some moisture from cleaning cloths without the particle board swelling and the surface generally disintegrating. I had a specific, limited, space it had to fit into and this is the only cabinet I found that fit, and was better quality. The stability is good/OK, about the same as the cheaper ClosetMaid, but it looks sooooo much better! Assembly was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Sue-Cat

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but cam hole issue.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cabinet for the price. It doesn't look like a Sauder unit, which we have and are happy with. I am giving it 3 instead of 5 stars because it would have only taken me about 45 minutes max to assemble but 6 of eight cam holes did not line up. I used glue on the dowels and it seems to be holding. If I have to I will just run screws in through the side and through the top and bottom shelf. Picture directions were quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: TracerRound

customer_reviews.title: As always Amazon was amazing in arranging rapid pick up by FedEx and crediting ...
customer_reviews.text: we were not able to out this together. the pieces were flimsy and the metal pins kept breaking. After 1 frustrating hour , we packed it up and returned it. As always Amazon was amazing in arranging rapid pick up by FedEx and crediting our account. thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Toni P. Reale

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to follow directions
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my wife wanted for her signed book collection. She was able to put it together in less than 45 minutes, with the help of 2 big dogs. Very easy to follow directions, the only tool needed was a phillips head screw driver. The backing is screwed on instead of nailed on, so in theory it should hold a lot longer! The handles are perfect for child proofing if that is needed. All around wonderful product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: grayed

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed tall night stands, but couldn’t find actual nightstands that were high enough so I ordered this and it works perfectly!! Ordering another for the other side!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cabinet and it was pretty easy for me to put together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Only so-so...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cabinet based on the other reviews, however, I'm not that crazy about it. It's nice, just not as great as the other reviews led me to believe. Two of the pieces were chipped and so Amazon sent us another one and between the two we were able to get one nice piece. It is pretty, but the quality isn't as great as the other reviewers said. Also, I thought the glass might be frosted based on how the picture looks, but it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Kibbles

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice cabinet but turns out I felt it was a little small, I dont see putting very many quilts or blankets in this
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo65721

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my den with a small tv on top. Easy to assemble. Took about 30 minutes. All that was needed was a phillips screwdriver. All pieces fit perfectly. I wish the wooden dowel rods came with wood glue though. They fit into the holes loosely. Nothing was damaged or scratched and packaging was solid.
customer_reviews.author: commstec

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have plenty of time and patience, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Missing hardware, what hardware that was there was flimsy and ill fitting. Could be a nice piece if it had decent hardware and instructions
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: A very beautiful piece of furniture. Easily put together, and very elegantly made.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Dunn

customer_reviews.title: glass door cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is well worth the money. Very good quality of wood. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: marlene briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Used this to put some extra china in. The right color right size and pricr
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Black  .

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy design, very functional for multiple uses
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: It’s small but holds most of the China. Perfect if you have a small space. Pay attention to measurement. Great price. I think I’m going to sit it on a dresser. TBD.
customer_reviews.author: playday05

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet.  Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a gift and it was a hit. Well made, great assembly instructions and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but very small...
customer_reviews.text: Thus cabinet looks nice, however it's really small, my hubby calls it a dollhouse cabinet...
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brick

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.  Did not meet expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This was so difficult to put together. Parts kept falling out. It wouldn’t stay leveled. Very disappointed in this product. Would not buy again. Parts did not fit property.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging,missing finish on parts and poor instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet arrived, but was missing the finish on the left door, and one of the shelves was missing finish and a chip of wood was missing! The cabinet was not marked as to which way was the front.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute little cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This little cabinet is exactly what I needed for my vintage glassware and stuff. It was super easy to assemble myself. Once is put together it’s actually heavy. The wood looks a d feel sturdy. I will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: xime1282

customer_reviews.title: Pleased in Nashville
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together.You have to be careful to watch to see front and back track for backing was only thing I had problem with on my first one.Really great how back is not nail down cheap job,has predrilled screw holes you match then a pastic piece you slide down center.Everything top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged. The box was torn.
customer_reviews.text: The Product came damaged in two places. One one the top and another on the glass, there is a scratch. It was easy to assemble, took me about 30 minutes and there were no missing parts. Took me longer to clean all the packing materials off it, kept sticking back.
customer_reviews.author: Hsk

customer_reviews.title: Messy.
customer_reviews.text: The wood frames that hold all of the glass on the front doors were Not Glued Together. It was a messy and time consuming job to glue all of the frames and waiting for them to dry before you can install the glass into the frames.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking cabinet. Perfect! Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookcase! It’s real wood not pressed sawdust. Fairly easy to put together and matches my furniture wood color.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet. I bought 3 for my kitchen . They are heavy-duty and extremely easy to assemble. They match my cabinets almost perfectly and look very nice. They do, however, have a very potent, obnoxious odor that takes a while to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, BUt!
customer_reviews.text: For those who have experienced the pain and agony of all sketches, no written instructions, this is a pretty easy project. BUT lots of slivers and the raw Chinese wood really needs to have a finish applied. We're replacing a pair of 1960s speaker systems with a pair of these cabinets and I'm not so sure that it's an improvement in our living room. I would not recommend these cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow - this was a worth purchase !
customer_reviews.text: Absolute stunning! It looks money - just buy it !
customer_reviews.author: CGK

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: 1st one delivered had a broken door. Was replaced within a week and 2nd one was just fine. Good cabinet for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RoadHammer

customer_reviews.title: Great display
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to display china dishes... works great and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an entertainment cabinet. Holds my cable box, x box and DVD's. I had to cut out the back for the cords but everything fits good in it. My cable box is a snug fit but the xbox 360 has plenty of room. The handles are perfect for a baby lock. Now the 1 year old can't get in there but all the remotes still work because of the glass doors.
customer_reviews.author: Madtown

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Took maybe 30-40 minutes to assemble. Great adjustable shelving. Looks beautiful and makes such a difference in keeping things organized. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Su

customer_reviews.title: Great buy...price and style
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is very sheek and classy and fits well in our church sanctuary. Love the size, style and color. Enough room to store our items and enough room to put items on the to. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Lady

customer_reviews.title: Piece of trash.
customer_reviews.text: Trash. Cam system won't work...holes are off. I've put together so many pieces of furniture over the years with this type of construction and never had a problem like this. Destroyed it trying to put it together, can't return now, waste of money. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: xXxGhotimanxXx

customer_reviews.title: Wood is nice, finish is nice
customer_reviews.text: Wood is nice, finish is nice, but the back didn't fit right, the screw locks for joining together were some cheap alloy and they all broke almost immediately, I had to use L Brackets. Looks nice and am Happy with outcome, just not happy they used low quality hardware and a cheap backing
customer_reviews.author: Vermonter

customer_reviews.title: Right size for my alcove and right price for my pocketbook!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is the height and price that I needed on my budget.
customer_reviews.author: SARA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: MADE 50 ADDABOYS FOR THIS ;)
customer_reviews.text: VERY SURPRISED AT THE QUALITY, ESPECIALLY FROM CHINA. EASY TO ASSEMBLE FROM PICTURES. I DID BREAK ONE OF THE ROTARY CAMS THAT LOCK PANELS TOGETHER. I BELIEVE I HAD SEEN THEM AT LOWES HARDWARE DEPT, AND WILL LOOK THERE FIRST FOR A REPLACEMENT. NEXT I WILL FIND SOME LED LIGHTS TO ATTACH UNDER EACH SHELF FOR DISPLAY OF HER S&P SHAKER COLLECTION.
customer_reviews.author: REEFERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted. A little tough to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. A little tough to put together. Careful when putting the doors on, screws are small. I suggest putting the screws in first without the doors, then back them out and then put the doors on, they will go on much, much easier.
customer_reviews.author: David B Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet it is really good quality exactly what I was looking for for. I ordered it for my collectibles . It is amazingly beautiful came on time, assembled it right away very easy no problems!!!!!! Good price !!! Definitely recommend this cabinet!!
customer_reviews.author: April bowling

customer_reviews.title: Cute..Little Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. A little small but otherwise nice. Cute little book cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Belcher

customer_reviews.title: nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: love this item! it really looks nice in my "woman cave"!!!! however, i do think it is a bit over-priced, although i only paid half since i had enough points to do so. that's probably the main reason why i purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price and very easy to assemble. Very heavy. The door pulls were a bit cheap looking so I replaced them. I also added mirror tiles and cordless lights to turn it into a lighted curio. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DGH

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL PIECE OF FURNITURE
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful piece of furniture. Very sturdy as well....I bought 3 of these to display my Native American pottery and other NA items I have collected over the years. I could of used 1 more however I see this is out of stock and not sure if it will be re-stocked, I think I got the last one they had. Very satisfied with these cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is a bit confusing BUT the product is beautiful in the end!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Actually solid wood, good quality. Of course the back side is particle board, but it's mainly to keep things from falling through the back of the piece- once the cabinet is set up and against the wall, you never have to look at the back 😉 Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: sekhmet

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for good quality
customer_reviews.text: Anyone handy with a screwdriver will find this easy to assemble. It's elegant simple look goes well with our Arts and Crafts era house.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Torrez

customer_reviews.title: Characters etched on glass
customer_reviews.text: Well made, clear instructions on how to assemble. However, there are Chinese characters noticeably etched on the glass on one of the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lake

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly good cabinet for the money. Easy to assemble if you read the instructions. It arrived well-packaged.
customer_reviews.author: MFHorn2

product_meta.title: Elegant Home Fashion Anna Floor Cabinet with 2-Door
product_meta.description: Anna Double Door Floor Cabinet in Oil Oak finish offers storage with style for the bathroom. Its elegant crown top molding and adjustable shelf helps make it easy to store items of different sizes. The tempered glass-paneled doors provides a clear view into the cabinet. The cabinet features metal knobs for easy opening. This sturdy cabinet comes with assembly hardware.
feature_bullets: Tempered glass enhances the safety MDF shelf construction provides durability
Antique Brass finish door hinges, handles gives the piece a classic look
Classic metal design, crown molding and adjustable shelves provide elegant bathroom storage
Inner shelves are adjustable, easy storage for tall objects
Assembly instructions offered in three languages: English, Spanish & French with a clear diagram style
A security nylon tape with wall anchor and screw are included to use to prevent tip over
Maximum Shelf Weight Capacity: 15 lb. per shelf
Care: Wipe clean using soft cloth with warm water

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars379 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
